statute.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a law passed by a parliament, council etc and formally written down
statute.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute  (=established by law).
statute.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a formal rule of an institution or organization
statute.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: College statutes forbid drinking on campus.
statute.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a law passed by a parliament, council etc and formally written down
statute.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: He never violated any criminal statutes.
Protection for the consumer is laid down by statute.
statute.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a real or imaginary written collection of the laws in existence
statute.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: The government would like to see this new law on the statute book as soon as possible.
